New Records: Ruben Trumpelmann became the first bowler to pick up 2 wickets in the first 2 balls in a men's T20I
Trumpelmann registered his career-best figures of four for 21
Key Match Events: Namibia bowled out Oman for just 109 in 19.4 overs
Ruben Trumpelmann got the big wickets of opener Kashyap Prajapati and captain Aqib Ilyas in the first two deliveries of the game
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Gerhard Erasmus won the toss and opted to bowl on a pitch that had plenty of assistance for bowlers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oman never got going in their innings in Barbados
Zeeshan Maqsood, their experienced all-rounder, was the only one in the top-order to score at a strike rate of over 100
Others: Veteran David Wiese chipped in with three wickets while captain Gerhard Erasmus, with his off-spin took two wickets and conceded just 20 runs in four overs
